name: Five Ten Freerider DLX Cycling Shoes - Men's
description: Comfort and control for flat pedal riders in wet conditions. The deluxe version of the much-loved Freerider has a polyurethane-coated upper to keep your toes dry on wet days or muddy trails. The ultra-tacky rubber sole keeps you grounded on your pedals, thanks to the full grip patterned bottom.PU-coated leather provides all-weather protection.EVA midsole for added shock absorption.One-piece molded cupsole for cushioned comfort.Stealth® S1™ rubber outsole sticks like glue.Classic Dotty™ tread stays clean.
